description: Imports a component and transforms its data into a component document.

parameters.name: semanticVersion
parameters.description: The semantic version of the component. This version follows the semantic version syntax.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the component denotes whether the component is used to build the image, or only to test it.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the resource that you want to import as a component.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier you provide to ensure idempotency of the request. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency in the Amazon EC2 API Reference. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: The client token that uniquely identifies the request.

nested_items.name: componentBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the imported component.
